quirks: will not ever drink alcohol.
can’t leave a bar without having a drink.
treats their weapon like the love of their life.
treats their steed or animal companion better than people.
will not ride any animal.
always makes religious gestures when leaving a temple even though they are not religious.
has a fear of small creatures.
always answers questions with questions.
prefers to sleep outside over sleeping inside buildings.
only eats raw meat not cooked meat.
takes trophies from all of their kills.
has B.A. Baracus Syndrome – the refuse to fly via any means.
occasionally speaks in another language that no one understands.
walks barefoot everywhere, does not use footwear.
wears an excessive amount of gaudy jewelry.
devotes intense study to vexillology.
is obsessed with creating a written chronicle of their journeys.
is obsessed with creating songs about their journeys.
always sings songs when traveling from one destination to another.
doesn’t like children and is incredibly awkward when dealing with them.
doesn’t like to enter holy buildings.
is afraid of the dark.
excessively tips everyone.
adds tattoos to their body for every new place they visit.
will only ride one specific type of animal.
constantly murmurs religious incantations.
doesn’t ever carry cash.
hides emergency stashes of supplies in every major area they go to.
doesn’t trust people who don’t remember their name.
believes potatoes are poisonous.
gets a new tatto whenever they commit a major sin against God.
has an evil sounding laugh.
is fond of headbutting anyone they get into an argument with.
collects pebbles.
denies the existence of gravity and always explains it away as something else.
prays for every corpse, friend or foe, that they come across.
compulsively apologises to anything, person or animal, before they kill it.
always carries a thimble in their pocket “Just in case…”.
strongly believes Elvis is still alive.
when time allows, they always paint their face with “the colors of war” prior to combat.
has a very odd, top secret nickname.
always looks incredibly awkward when fighting.
always breaks out in a dance when they win, whether it is an argument, a fight, or a game of cards.
